alert.note: Alert for East Wind River Mountains, South Shoshone NF; Upper Wind River Basin, Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 20 at 1:13PM MDT until July 22 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON THURSDAY TO 8 PM MDT FRIDAY... The National Weather Service in Riverton has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 12 PM Thursday to 8 PM MDT Friday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * IMPACTS: Low humidity...above normal temperatures...and gusty westerly wind will create erratic fire behavior and new fire starts. * AFFECTED AREA: In Central WY...Fire Weather Zones 283 and 288. * COUNTIES AFFECTED: In Central WY...Fremont. In West Central WY...Sublette. * WIND: West 12 to 20 mph with gusts 25 to 35 mph. * HUMIDITY: As low as 10 percent. * TEMPERATURES: Highs 90 to 95...with 75 to 85 mountains.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: East Wind River Mountains, South Shoshone NF; Upper Wind River Basin, Wind River Basin
